languages.text: "Дело в том, что, по неписанному закону Футфола, Вольные Торговцы наделены на нем особой властью, превышающей даже полномочия Наместника. Но не все и не в любой ситуации хотят ей пользоваться. Высадка инкогнито дает больше свободы действий. Официальный визит позволяет прямо вмешиваться в местные дела".

traits.locale_text: "Дело в том, что, по неписанному закону Футфола, Вольные Торговцы наделены на нем особой властью, превышающей даже полномочия Наместника. Но не все и не в любой ситуации хотят ей пользоваться. Высадка инкогнито дает больше свободы действий. Официальный визит позволяет прямо вмешиваться в местные дела".

languages.text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."
languages.original_text: "Дело в том, что, по неписанному закону Футфола, Вольные Торговцы наделены на нем особой властью, превышающей даже полномочия Наместника. Но не все и не в любой ситуации хотят ей пользоваться. Высадка инкогнито дает больше свободы действий. Официальный визит позволяет прямо вмешиваться в местные дела".

traits.locale_text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, the Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Governor. However, not everybody chooses to take advantage of that — consider taking the situation into account. Arriving incognito will give you more room to maneuver, an official visit will allow to directly interfere in the local affairs."

"According to Footfall's unwritten laws, the Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Governor. However, not everybody chooses to take advantage of that — consider taking the situation into account. Arriving incognito will give you more room to maneuver, an official visit will allow to directly interfere in the local affairs."

"According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, not everybody chooses to take advantage of them, depending on the situation. Arriving incognito will give you more room for maneuver, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

"According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, not everybody chooses to take advantage of them, depending on the situation. Arriving incognito will give you more room for maneuver, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

"According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

languages.text: «Según las leyes no escritas de Paso, los Comerciantes Independientes disfrutan de privilegios especiales superiores al poder del Señor de la estación. Sin embargo, pueden optar por no ejercer estos privilegios en determinadas circunstancias. Llegar de incógnito le dará más margen de maniobra, mientras que una visita oficial le permitirá intervenir directamente en los asuntos locales».
languages.original_text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

traits.locale_text: «Según las leyes no escritas de Paso, los Comerciantes Independientes disfrutan de privilegios especiales superiores al poder del Señor de la estación. Sin embargo, pueden optar por no ejercer estos privilegios en determinadas circunstancias. Llegar de incógnito le dará más margen de maniobra, mientras que una visita oficial le permitirá intervenir directamente en los asuntos locales».

languages.text: “根据落脚港不成文的法律，行商浪人拥有特权，甚至足以超越总督的权力。不过，在某些情况下，行商浪人可以选择不行使这些特权。隐姓埋名会为您留下更多斡旋的余地，而正式造访可以让您直接干预当地的事务。”
languages.original_text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

traits.locale_text: “根据落脚港不成文的法律，行商浪人拥有特权，甚至足以超越总督的权力。不过，在某些情况下，行商浪人可以选择不行使这些特权。隐姓埋名会为您留下更多斡旋的余地，而正式造访可以让您直接干预当地的事务。”

languages.text: 「フットフォールでは暗黙の了解で、自由開拓者は領主の力を超える特別な特権を享受できます。ただ、特定の状況においてはその特権を行使しない選択もございます。お忍びで到着すると動きやすくなりますし、公式訪問すれば現地の問題に直接介入できるようになります」
languages.original_text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールでは暗黙の了解で、自由開拓者は領主の力を超える特別な特権を享受できます。ただ、特定の状況においてはその特権を行使しない選択もございます。お忍びで到着すると動きやすくなりますし、公式訪問すれば現地の問題に直接介入できるようになります」

languages.text: "Den ungeschriebenen Gesetzen von Footfall zufolge genießen Freihändler besondere Privilegien, die sogar die Macht des Lehnsherren übertreffen. Allerdings müssen sie diese Privilegien in bestimmten Situationen nicht unbedingt einfordern. Inkognito könnt Ihr Euch freier bewegen, wohingegen Ihr bei einem offiziellen Besuch direkt in die lokalen Angelegenheiten eingreifen könnt."
languages.original_text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

traits.locale_text: "Den ungeschriebenen Gesetzen von Footfall zufolge genießen Freihändler besondere Privilegien, die sogar die Macht des Lehnsherren übertreffen. Allerdings müssen sie diese Privilegien in bestimmten Situationen nicht unbedingt einfordern. Inkognito könnt Ihr Euch freier bewegen, wohingegen Ihr bei einem offiziellen Besuch direkt in die lokalen Angelegenheiten eingreifen könnt."

languages.text: « Selon la loi tacite de Castel, les libres-marchands bénéficient de privilèges spéciaux qui dépassent même le pouvoir du suzerain. Cependant, il peut être préférable de renoncer à ces privilèges dans certaines situations. Vous aurez une plus grande marge de manœuvre en arrivant incognito, tandis qu'une visite officielle vous permettra d'intervenir directement dans les affaires locales. »
languages.original_text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

traits.locale_text: « Selon la loi tacite de Castel, les libres-marchands bénéficient de privilèges spéciaux qui dépassent même le pouvoir du suzerain. Cependant, il peut être préférable de renoncer à ces privilèges dans certaines situations. Vous aurez une plus grande marge de manœuvre en arrivant incognito, tandis qu'une visite officielle vous permettra d'intervenir directement dans les affaires locales. »

languages.text: "Binliman'ın yazılı olmayan kurallarına göre bir Hür Tacir, Emîr'in gücünü bile aşan özel ayrıcalıklara sahiptir ancak belli durumlarda bu ayrıcalıkları kullanmamayı yeğleyebilir. Kimliğinizi gizleyerek girmek size daha özgür hareket etme fırsatı verir, resmî bir ziyaret ise doğrudan yerel meselelere müdahale etmenize olanak tanıyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "According to Footfall's unwritten laws, Rogue Traders enjoy special privileges that exceed even the power of the Liege. However, they may choose not to exercise those privileges in certain situations — arriving incognito will give you more room for manoeuvre, while an official visit will allow you to directly intervene in local affairs."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman'ın yazılı olmayan kurallarına göre Hür Tacir, Emîr'in gücünü bile aşan özel ayrıcalıklar kullanabilir ancak belli durumlarda bu ayrıcalıkları kullanmamayı tercih edebilir. Kimliğinizi gizleyerek girmek size daha fazla menavra kabiliyeti verirken, resmî bir ziyaret direkt olarak yerel konulara müdahale etmenize olanak tanır."
